review: Works great, but I wish there was an option to directly connect it to the Internet so I don't have to solely rely on WiFi
author: Andrew Luehmann

review: Works as advertised and  much more convenient than hooking up laptop to computer to watch Prime Videos
author: Zebulon

review: I only got this because it was an add-on for Sling TV but I must say I'm pretty impressed. I have a Samsung Smart TV thats about 3 years old and this device is so much more "snappy". The remote for app for the Iphone is excellent as well.
author: MJ

review: It's a great addition to my TV.  Due to getting my tax documents in order I haven't had much time to fully explore it.The little I have been able to use it was great! I also like the phone app for times I misplace the remote control or my wife hides it from me.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works amazingly if you have a wifi connection with or without a password. The main reason I bought the fire tv stick was for traveling, but most hotels have a prompt in a browser to connect instead of a password. Rendering this product useless until they add some support for it. Very unsatisfied.
author: Steven Cowan

review: It is easy to install, as promised. Use is pretty straightforward. You turn on your tv, Fire comes up as source and it loads a menu.  You use a very small remote control to access the menu. Not a lot of buttons to figure out.  There is a nice, quick tutorial upon installation. A major issue, however, is that every couple of days, I've got to unplug the unit and let it reboot.  That gets a bit annoying.  I recognize the reboot symptoms when the remote quits working.  Annoying, but I'm using it.
author: J. Moore
